original_title: CBSL Governor to be summoned to Parliament committee probing bankruptcy
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A decision has been reached to summon Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe, before the Select Committee of Parliament to Investigate Causes for Financial Bankruptcy declared by the Government.
Chairman of the committee MP Sagara Kariyawasam said Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe was called to appear before the committee next week.
The Secretary to the Ministry of Finance Mahinda Siriwardana testified before the committee last week.
